tweets.text: My latest #PhD paper is now out! Assessing studded tiles as a tool for re-establishing river connectivity for river lamprey, and suggestions for future tile designs. Check out the #openaccess paper: https://t.co/PDToq91B2i #fishsci #lampetra @DurUni_Aqua_Lab @DurBiol @EnvAgency https://t.co/RVqEocUXXZ

Here, in one thread of replies, is everything @EnvAgency need to petition @DefraGovUK @BorisJohnson  for a complete reform of river regs. It's not even that hard. Education, proactive & responsive monitoring, regulation with big shiny teeth. @theriverstrust @Feargal_Sharkey https://t.co/bdsT970XZc

tweets.text: @esriuk @EnvAgency @LivingAtlas Great to see a @EnvAgency @dataenvagency presence on ArcGIS Online with referenced ESRI Map Services, WMS & WFS from https://t.co/QjiSFWe7bT. Do you have a release schedule? For ease of analysis/mapping in ArcGIS Online - any future plans for ESRI Feature Services (hosted/ref'd)?

Pleased to see careful targeted de-silting underway on #SteepingRiver, #Lincolnshire. Part of Catchment Action Plan, which followed from last year's flood events in #Wainfleet. Good partnership between @wmcidb @EnvAgencyMids @KonSmals. @robertcaudwell 

https://t.co/mRnys3QcjR

Great to see so many #flood wardens & #community #volunteers on our Incident Management webinar tonight - we‚Äôre talking plans & procedures for groups, command structure, managing the media, flood plans & much more! #CPYorks @EnvAgencyYNE @SimonHildonEA @GroundworkYorks https://t.co/sYvYNuOcEK

Day 49.

The next environmental ticking time bomb will be toxic and dangerous #PFAS and #PFOS chemicals in UK waters.

Hoping for voices to amplify and investigate.

tweets.text: @EnvAgency Greenwash.

Rivers are vital to our environment. We respond to an environmental incident every 45 minutes to stop and reverse damage to our rivers. 
 
Let's work together to protect them. 
 
#WorldRiversDay https://t.co/0d3EzXd2ic

We've started Phase B of the @south_cumbria_rivers_trust #nfm #slowtheflow project above Staveley in the #LakeDistrict  It's been great to get such massive support from  @lakelandfarmvc the local community & the all important funding from @envagencynw #leakydams #uplands https://t.co/6NcGuwLDul

The #FCERMStrategy is now a legally binding document

It informs our future direction to help make millions of homes and businesses more resilient to #Flooding #CoastalErosion and #ClimateChange

Read more: https://t.co/H11CyMb2v8 https://t.co/p0Yl8p64mZ

@EnvAgency https://t.co/XhIU1qinUb 

#WorldRiversDay2020 #Ecocide

Our television ad goes live today üòÄ

Please Follow us and Retweet to help us stop fly-tippers and always report #flytipping on our free app, wherever you are in the UK https://t.co/SSBKRNiqzf

We're pleased to announce the @EnvAgency have nominated 10 layers into the @LivingAtlas for the UK. We will be showcasing individual layers over the coming weeks üåç You can explore the layers for yourself here: https://t.co/S2EzqWDEto https://t.co/eVloRWvFav

tweets.text: @EnvAgency I'm genuinely curious - what was the total amount of fines handed out to polluters last year?

@oneliferideit @NatResWales @visitsnowdonia @EnvAgency @WelshGovernment @LIFEprogramme @DwrCymru @TrywerynNWWC @YCyfnodCorwenT Hi Steve. As part of the works, the boulders from the weir were redistributed within the channel as these are vitally important elements that help stabilise the bed of the river, and provide habitat and spawning features for the many different species that live in the river üëç

@RussellB1ggs @EnvAgency @JamesBevanEA @EmmaHowardBoyd And just look at the Eign brook a forgotten tributary of the Wye running through Hereford city. It's a disgrace for one of England's greatest salmon rivers.
